short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check the details of your Leica lens by entering its serial number. Applicable to Leica cameras before 2000.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Leica Camera Checker is your trusted Chrome extension for verifying and retrieving vital details of Leica cameras before year 2000. Simply input your camera's serial number to instantly uncover its manufacturing year, model name, and other key specifications. With its intuitive interface, Leica Camera Checker ensures a seamless experience for users of all levels. Whether you're a seasoned Leica photographer or a camera collector, this extension is an essential tool for authenticating and understanding your Leica cameras. Simplify your camera verification process today with Leica Camera Checker!
